name: Boomstone
description:
BOOMSTONE!

Prove you have the fastest fingers in the west with this tap fest featuring beautiful hand drawn graphics and oozing western charm!

SHOOT:
Plough your way through hundreds of baddies on the streets of Boomstone, as they come running in from all directions, but be sure not to accidentally shoot the Sheriff, or the many friendly Dancing girls!

PLAY:
Be the life of the party by playing some of the best ragtime music composed by Scott Joplin, while your friends enjoy the show!

COLLECT:
Collect puzzle pieces by playing to complete illustrations of the characters in the gallery mode!

ENJOY:
Heaps of different mini-games and vibrant scenes each designed with a different approach to keeping your fingers busy!

See if you can beat the high score and clean up Boomstone while you're at it!
